item.title: Darlene Love - Christmas - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: F, Am, Bb, C7, Dm
As performed by Darlene Love
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/HJmjt8pwp6I
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at:
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems - Key of F, G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe

item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of D, Eb, E, and F.
Chords Used: D, G, A7, Eb, Ab, Bb7, E, A, B7, F, Bb, C7

item.title: Stephanie Leavell - Shy Little Monster - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F.
Chords Used: F, A, Bb, C
As performed by Stephanie Leavell at musicforkiddos.com. A book package is available!
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/mSpOYsBAb5Y
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Video from motionbolt.com.

item.title: Billy Ray Cyrus - Achy Breaky Heart - Key of F
item.description:
Achy Breaky Heart by Billy Ray Cyrus. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: F & C (or F & C7)
SAME SONG IN C (using C and G or G7): https://youtu.be/Mvx_NsalPkY
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Lift Every Voice And Sing - Ukulele Play Along - Key of F
item.description:
Lift Every Voice and Sing by the Abyssinian Baptist Church. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, A7, Dm, Bbdim, Dm, Gm, A, Bb, D, D7
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. item.title: Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Key of F
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Christopher Davis-Shannon - Don't Call Me Honey - Baritone Ukulele - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. For DGBE Ukulele. Key of F, a whole step higher than the original version. There just wasn't a good key for Baritone ukulele (G would have made Davis-Shannon sound like Mickey Mouse).
Chords Used: F, F7, Bb, Bbm6, C7, D7, G7, Bdim7, E7, A7, Bm
As performed by Christopher Davis-Shannon. Special thanks to him, as he gave me permission to use this song and also provided help with the chords shown . Incidentally, he plays the song "in C" but on a ukulele tuned up a minor third (i.e. Eb).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: The Kiboomers - Columbus Day - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: F & C
Columbus Day by The Kiboomers! Integrate history / social studies / core subjects into your music class. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. Their original video may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-yzzCYJDPrQ .
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available.
